definition: stronghold/defended military base/base for operations/strategic point/foothold/(market) presence
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Chaos Hydras are the most powerful creature of the Fortresses.
sentences.chinese: 遠古巨獸是據點裏最強大的生物。

sentences.english: A Burmese Army base exists in Sang Hka and the 6th battalion of the KIA is situated opposite it.
sentences.chinese: 緬軍桑卡基地和克欽獨立軍第六營據點對面。

sentences.english: POWs excavated three tunnels below this Nazi stronghold.
sentences.chinese: 戰俘們在這個納粹據點地下挖出了三條隧道。

sentences.english: According to the point-set topology theory, regions with holes are redefined.
sentences.chinese: 根據點集拓撲學理論，對帶孔面域進行了定義。

sentences.english: Irrefutable evidence, we had the last one day every stronghold.
sentences.chinese: 鐵證如山，我方一舉拿下最後一個日僞據點。

sentences.english: Step 3: Fold your sweaters in acid-free tissue paper, which you can find online or in good stationery stores.
sentences.chinese: 摺疊毛衣放入無酸性紙巾中，可在網上或新據點找到。

sentences.english: Other remote American outposts have closed too.
sentences.chinese: 其他偏遠的美軍前哨據點也已被關閉。

sentences.english: The enemy may assail our defense positions tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 敵人可能明天就攻擊我們的防守據點。

sentences.english: Land in Dorne and raise my banners.
sentences.chinese: 以多恩爲據點舉起旗幟。

sentences.english: Many Hong Kong operators have gained a foothold in overseas Internet markets.
sentences.chinese: 不少香港營運商已在海外互聯網市場建立據點。

sentences.english: The outpost didn't have enough soldiers or defenses.
sentences.chinese: 據點沒有足夠的士兵或防禦措施。

sentences.english: By the middle of the 18th century, French colonialists set up base Diyou Ken fort.
sentences.chinese: 18世紀中葉，法國殖民者在此建立據點迪尤肯堡。

sentences.english: Lade Fan separatist forces in the southern region is one of the main strongholds.
sentences.chinese: 拉德範地區是南部分裂勢力的主要據點之一。

sentences.english: Lunenburg is the best surviving example of a planned British colonial settlement in North America.
sentences.chinese: 盧嫩堡是北美洲設計精心的英國殖民據點的典範。

sentences.english: New proposals would begin to erode the last bastion of press freedom in the country.
sentences.chinese: 而新的動議將開始侵蝕這片俄國新聞自由的最後據點。

sentences.english: This is the first official Japanese Self-Defense Forces overseas construction activities at the base.
sentences.chinese: 這是日本首次正式在海外建設自衛隊活動據點。
